Title: INC000006451810 / E-SD014555258
Description: NYTTA - Not possible to change requested execution date on Temporary disconnection
Solution (Running / new instances): The data binding was updated, so the requested execution date can be changed (Please test for temporary disconnection, but all other errand types with this field visible are affected) All running instances will be affected as well
Impact: Whole Nytta application
Tests: opened SN 322697771, changed the date, pressed continue, checked if the date was still the same when the confirmation popup appears (task was not executed by developer)
